REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A RM F f0509 reute r f BC-MARINE-MIDLAND-<MM>-B 03-04 0066

TEXT.TITLE: MARINE MIDLAND <MM> BUYS BROKERAGE ASSETS
TEXT.BODY: Marine Midland Banks Inc said it has acquired the customer account base of New York discount brokerage firm Ovest Financial Services Inc for undisclosed terms to expand its discount brokerage operations in the Northeastern U.S. It said it will combine Ovest's activities with those of its Marine Midland Brokerage Service unit. Reuter
